node.title: British woman confirmed to be first known casualty in Tonga as UN concerned about distress beacon
node.alt: Angela Glover holds a small puppy near her face and smiles.
node.description:
The brother of UK woman Angela Glover confirms her body has been found after she was swept away in the tsunami caused by the eruption of the Hunga Tonga-Hunga Ha'apai volcano.

Â
node.content:
["The body of a\u00a0British woman reportedly swept away in Tonga's tsunami has been found, as the\u00a0UN expresses\u00a0concern for two small low-lying islands where a\u00a0distress beacon was\u00a0activated.\u00a0\u00a0", "Angela Glover, 50, is the first known death in Tonga following\u00a0the eruption of the Hunga Tonga-Hunga Ha'apai volcano on Saturday, which triggered a tsunami which was felt around the world.", "Ms Glover's brother Nick Eleini, who lives in Sydney, confirmed her body had been found and said the family was \"devastated\" by the loss.\u00a0", "\"She loved her life \u2014 both when she was working in London and then she achieved her life's dream of going to work in the south Pacific,\" Mr Eleini said.", "Ms Glover moved to Tonga with her husband, James, where she\u00a0started the Tonga Animal Welfare Society.", "\"She was beautiful, she was absolutely a ray of sunshine,\" Mr Eleini said.", "\"I understand that this terrible accident came about as they tried to rescue their dogs.\"", "Mr Glover, who runs a tattoo shop called The Happy Sailor,\u00a0was able to survive the tsunami by clinging to a tree.\u00a0", "\"I haven't got the words in my vocabulary to even describe how we're feeling at the moment,\" Mr Eleini said.\u00a0", "\"This is just a terrible shock that's happened to us.", "\"You know, we're ordinary people. Stuff like this just doesn't happen to people like us. But then it does.\"", "Two women reportedly drowned in Peru when large waves caused by the eruption swept them away.", "", "
The eruption sent enormous plumes of smoke and ash high into the atmosphere.(AFP:\u00a0Tonga Geological Services/Eyepress)
", "
Distress signal prompts UN concern
", "Initial reports suggested no mass casualties on the main island of Togatapu, but two people were reported missing and the capital Nuku'alofa was badly damaged, as were resorts and homes along the island's western beaches.", "\"Further volcanic activity cannot be ruled out,\" the UN\u00a0Office for the Coordination of Humanitarian Affairs (OCHA) said in an update.", "OCHA said only minor injuries had been reported but emphasised\u00a0formal assessments, especially of the outer islands, had yet to be released, with communications badly hit.", "The uninhabited volcanic island of Hunga Tonga-Hunga Ha'apai all but disappeared following the blast, according to satellite images from around 12 hours later.", "The Pacific archipelago was blanketed in ash and volcanic ash clouds spread to countries thousands of kilometres to the west.", "The OCHA said there had been no contact from the Ha'apai group of islands and there was \"particular concern\" about two small low-lying islands \u2014 Fonoi and Mango \u2014\u00a0where an active distress beacon had been detected.", "According to the Tonga government, 36 people live on Mango and 69 on Fonoi.", "Australia and New Zealand sent surveillance flights to Tonga on Monday to assess damage and Pacific Minister\u00a0Zed Seselja said Australian police had visited beaches and reported significant damage, with \"houses thrown around\".", "Tonga is still without internet, meaning many families abroad are anxiously waiting to hear if their loved ones are safe.\u00a0", "The company that owns the single underwater fibre-optic cable that connects the island nation to the rest of the world said it likely was severed in the eruption and repairs could take weeks.", "", "
Social media videos in Tonga show residents running for cover as large waves crash ashore.
", "
'Completely destroyed'
", "The Ha'atafu Beach Resort, on the Hihifo peninsula, 21km west of the capital Nuku'alofa, was \"completely wiped out\", the owners said on Facebook.", "The family that manages the resort had run for their lives through the bush to escape the tsunami, it said.", "\"The whole western coastline has been completely destroyed along with Kanukupolu village,\" the resort said.", "The Red Cross said it was mobilising its network to respond to what it called the worst volcanic eruption the Pacific has experienced in decades.", "Katie Greenwood, the Pacific head of delegation for the International Federation of Red Cross and Red Crescent Societies, told Reuters up to 80,000 people could have been affected by the tsunami.", "ABC/wires"]
